markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Desert](/Rules.aspx?ID=598)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 512 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Desert encompasses sandy and rocky deserts as well as badlands. Though tundra is technically a desert, it’s classified as arctic, as the climate is the primary challenge in such areas. Sandy deserts often have quicksand hazards (page 526) and sandstorms.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<document level="2" id="rules-599" />

<document level="2" id="rules-600" />
name: Desert

text: Desert Source Core Rulebook pg. 512 4.0 Desert encompasses sandy and rocky deserts as well as badlands. Though tundra is technically a desert, it’s classified as arctic, as the climate is the primary challenge in such areas. Sandy deserts often have quicksand hazards (page 526) and sandstorms.
